nodes.text: The Veil speeder was a model of speeder produced by Valkeri Enterprises for the use of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. The Veil was a light vehicle that consisted of a seat attached to a duralium frame, with one repulsor and four winglike attachments on the sides. The Vanguard, a larger ground vehicle also designed by Valkeri Enterprises, held two Veil speeders at its rear.
